Html:
It seems there is a little bit a confusion about WPF Ribbon.

We have developed with WPF Ribbon for more then 14 months
and we expected the Ribbon in VS2010 and it didn't happen.

what is the Microsoft strategy about Ribbon ?
is there a plan to release a new version of WPF Ribbon in codeplex or not ?

(few months ago a new project appeared in codeplex named Fluent Ribbon ....???)

Thank you very much
Marco

I was using WPF ribbon too, but changed to Fluent Ribbon at http://fluent.codeplex.com/

The Fluent project is in constant upgrade and bug fixing, also support the new Office 2010 style

Also, using Fluent I reduced the lines in my xaml in 70% (Fluent is MVVM-friendable)

WPF Toolkit is a great project, as we use their DataGrid and Calendar..
but the project has slow updates and bug fixs..

(and I don't know why my replies doesn't have breaklines after posted)
